text.title: Be an Intimidating Girl
text.head: Be an Intimidating Girl
text.p: Being a strong, independent, and confident girl in today's world can be "intimidating" to others. Successful people can be all these things without being hateful. Here's how to present yourself powerfully so others will know who's the boss.
text.head: Steps

list.item: Work on your Attitude: You have to have the "I don't care attitude" mostly when someone you feel is not worth your time talks to you. Look at them with one eyebrow raised, and your arms crossed, legs hips apart. Body language is key. Also, practice a glare. A glare is key, but make sure it says "You don't matter, but don't you dare show me attitude" .

Grow some humor. The way you talk plays a large role. Talk with dry humor, insult, and wit. Don't be afraid to insult someone to their face.Than throw in a signature stare, which is combined of model eyes, and a slight smirk.

Make sure you make it clear you are better than someone else. No matter how you do it. It's important to make your friends feel like they are on a lower level.You can laugh loudly with your friend to make everyone turn their heads when you make fun of people.

Appearance: Dress however you want, look however you want but not very 'feminine' or trendy, walk with a slight swagger(hand slightly in your back or side pocket) as if you own the scene,because you know you do!Don't walk too fast, walk slower than normally and just think smooth.
Be smart. You have to be intimidating to everyone. Study hard in your spare time, read if you must.

Talk at every opportunity possible. Act like you know their deepest secrets and desires. Just stare right into their eyes, to make then uncomfortable, and when they get flushed and look away, smirk with your mouth closed.Never Back Down!

text.head: Tips

list.item: You can still smile, joke, laugh, and other things you usually do.
Don't try to change yourself for other people.
Being intimidating does not mean you have permission to be a cold-hearted person, or emotionless.
Don't try too hard, people will notice.
Don't over do your makeup or hair.
Be built, as a girl maybe you can lift weights and do push ups. Anything to grow you muscles, no one will mess with you!
Know that the boys and men might not be intimidated yet, but do everything above to get them intimidated.

text.head: Warnings

list.item: Don't do this if you are the new kid. People will quickly shove you out and you will end up being a loner forever.
You might get shot down a lot.
